Yellow proposes we issue a joint statement underscoring sovereignty, diplomacy, and economic cooperation as keys to ensuring lasting de-escalation and peace.

Blue welcomes the de-escalation opportunity created by Orange's withdrawal. Let's propose peace talks to solidify this, while maintaining coordination on calibrated sanctions drawdowns to encourage continued progress.

Let's carefully calibrate economic incentives and restrictions to encourage Orange's continued de-escalation. High-level diplomacy can also help consolidate recent gains.

Pink applauds Purple's commitment to de-escalation. Please inform us of any humanitarian needs arising from the conflict so we can assist.

Red proposes expanding trade and investment to grow our economic partnership amid regional instability. This will provide stability and mutual benefits.
